short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan retail websites (ex. Walmart, Home Depot, AbeBooks, etc) to determine if you can flip their products for profit on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We compare products from online retailers to their relevant Amazon listing. Making it as easy as possible to find the best online arbitrage deals.
